                       Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"I was panic stricken when they told me that I had to go on dialysis. I was so 
anxious to get a kidney that I would have done anything....When you&#039;re desperate, 
morality goes out the window." Richard, 71-year-old Canadian transplant tourist.

THE PASSIONATE EYE presents Transplant Tourism, an expose of the global black 
market trade in human organs.
